mapper.sql: select case when gb = 1 then '합계' else date_format(str_to_date(s.stat_de, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') end as stat_de , sum(requst_cnt) requst_cnt , sum(succes_cnt) succes_cnt , round(sum(succes_cnt) / (case when sum(requst_cnt) > 0 then sum(requst_cnt) else 1 end) * 100, 2) as succes_rate , sum(failr_cnt) failr_cnt , round(sum(failr_cnt) / (case when sum(requst_cnt) > 0 then sum(requst_cnt) else 1 end) * 100, 2) as failr_rate from stat_crtt_day s inner join (select 1 gb union all select 2 gb) d where s.stat_de >= replace(#{srchDtFr}, '-', '') and s.stat_de <= replace(#{srchDtTo}, '-', '') group by case when gb = 1 then '합계' else date_format(str_to_date(s.stat_de, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') end order by stat_de desc

select case when gb = 1 then '합계' else date_format(str_to_date(s.stat_de, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') end as stat_de , sum(s.regist_cnt) as regist_cnt , sum(s.succes_cnt) as succes_cnt , round(sum(s.succes_cnt) / (case when sum(s.regist_cnt) > 0 then sum(s.regist_cnt) else 1 end) * 100, 2) as succes_rate , sum(s.failr_cnt) as failr_cnt , round(sum(s.failr_cnt) / (case when sum(s.regist_cnt) > 0 then sum(s.regist_cnt) else 1 end) * 100, 2) as failr_rate from stat_glry_day s inner join (select 1 gb union all select 2 gb) d where s.stat_de >= replace(#{srchDtFr}, '-', '') and s.stat_de <= replace(#{srchDtTo}, '-', '') group by case when gb = 1 then '합계' else date_format(str_to_date(s.stat_de, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') end order by stat_de desc
